bibl.title: Report on the Excavation in the South Church at Hermopolis - Ashmunayn (Winter 1991).
bibl.note: Description of the South Church. - On the Date of the South Church [fifth century]. - On the Pottery Excavated in the South Church. - Bibliography. - P. 53, n. 16: Greek inscription in the baptistry font (transcription in capitals).
GROSSMANN Peter and Donald M. BAILEY, Report on the Excavation in the South Church at Hermopolis - Ashmunayn (Winter 1991).
Journal of Coptic Studies 3 (2001) pp. 45-61, 10 figg. et pll. 3-8.
